descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
[media]
The First Multiplayer Horror VR game inspired by **Phasmophobia.**

**discord.gg/hsvr** (horror simulator vr) join to win gifts🎁

# 👻Play with friends, laugh and run!
A game you **work together** to **solve puzzles**, **explore** creepy places & **survive scary chases**!
- **3 HUGE MAPS**: BigHouse, HighSchool, OldFactory. Wait for you!
- **2 MODES**: Easy Mode for beginners, Crazy Mode with 10 super-powered demons!

[media]

# 👻 Easy to play, can't stop screaming!
1. **Find the Room**: listen to whisper/find the floating stuffs.
2. **So Many Tools**: Pour holy water to track demons, hold a Bible let them away....
3. **Catch the Evil**: Match right tools & rush to the platform. Trap the demon!
4. **Use Power-ups**: Use a **voice changer** to talk like DonaldDuck, take **pills** to become devil, ring **the bell** to bring your friend alive. Don't let the devil kill you!

[media]

# 👻 Heart-pumping chases!
If you love games like Lethal Company\Animal Company. Or enjoy the environment of FNAF. This is your new favorite!

 In Crazy Mode, demons kill when you are alone. RUN to your friends or get caught!

# 👻 Cool power-ups!
Want to make some fun? Use the **speed-up lollipop** to get rid of the chasing, take the **pill** to pretend to be a demon! You can blow on **your controller** to stop them! 

Here are more...
[media]

# 👻 Dress up!
Be Creative! Unlock masks, and cool avatars! If you like Gorilla Tag or Yeeps' cosmetics, continue here! 

You will have FNAF's Freddy bear mask, angel avatars...
[media]

# Key Features:
- Play with friends/Solo
- Sandbox exploration
- Daily/weekly missions
- Run, hide, and survive
